name: ArcLand
description:
Arcland is a 2d platformer where you are a cave explorer who accidentally falls in a pit which leads to a big cave system. After some exploration, you find remains of an old civilization that used to live there, but they are long extinct, but the cave is still populated.

Explore the cave and find secret rooms, chests, coins, and more treasure that is hidden deep into the cave.

Game Features:
- Pixel art game style with graphic similar to classic console games
- Explore the super dangerous dungeon as a treasure hunter.
- Challenging monsters and dangers.
